title: Factors Associated with Ozone Layer Depletion

content.question: Which of the following correctly identifies the three main characteristics associated with the hole in the ozone layer?

choices.label: Main Chemical Responsible for Causing Ozone Hole Formation Geographic Location of the Ozone Hole Form of Energy Entering Earth due to Ozone Hole Formation <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> North Pole Ultra Violet

Main Chemical Responsible for Causing Ozone Hole Formation Geographic Location of the Ozone Hole Form of Energy Entering Earth due to Ozone Hole Formation <math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> South Pole Ultra Violet

Main Chemical Responsible for Causing Ozone Hole Formation Geographic Location of the Ozone Hole Form of Energy Entering Earth due to Ozone Hole Formation <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> South Pole Infra-Red

Main Chemical Responsible for Causing Ozone Hole Formation Geographic Location of the Ozone Hole Form of Energy Entering Earth due to Ozone Hole Formation <math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> North Pole Infra-Red

content.answer: Main Chemical Responsible for Causing Ozone Hole Formation Geographic Location of the Ozone Hole Form of Energy Entering Earth due to Ozone Hole Formation <math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> South Pole Ultra Violet

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
